naslov: Prodaja, Kuća, Poslovno-stambena zgrada, Zagrebačka županija, Samobor, (prodaja)
opis: SAMOBOR, IZUZETNA  KUĆA SA LIJEPOM OKUĆNICOM BAZENOM I GARAŽOM ZA UREDITI 500M2 STAMBENOG PROSTORA, MOŽE BITI I LIJEPI DOM ZA STARIJE, U PRIZEMLJU POSOVNI PROSTOR NALAZI SE U LIJEPOJ I MIRNOJ ULICI Detalji: Prizemlje: - garaža 25m2 - ostakljeni prostor za dodatni stan u kojem se ulazi u garažu i još tri pomoćne prostorijedio za kotlovnicu Prvi Kat: - ulazni hodnik koji na jednu stranu izlazi na balkon sa dvorišne strane - desno kuhinja sa open space boravkom i blagavaonicom, te izlazom na baklon - lijevo kupaonica i tri spavaće sobe Drugi kat: - ulazni hodnik - na lijevo dvije spavaće sobe koje izlaze na balkon - lijevo kupaonica i još dvije spavaće sobe - stepenice za potkrovlje Specifičnosti: - kuća je građena kvalitetno - terba ju cijelu urediti - svi priključci su unutra - u potkrovlju može biti još manji stan od 60m2 - može se koristiti kao poslovno-stambeni objekat - cijeli objekat sa garažom i bazenom je legaliziran i ima uporabnu dozvolu Za sve dodatne informacije kao i razgled slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Ivana +385 98 304 111 SAMOBOR, AN EXCEPTIONAL HOUSE WITH A BEAUTIFUL GARDEN, SWIMMING POOL, AND GARAGE TO RENOVATE 500M2 OF LIVING SPACE CAN BE A NICE HOME FOR THE ELDERLY, ON THE GROUND FLOOR BUSINESS SPACE Details: Ground floor: garage 25m2 glazed space for an additional apartment with access to the garage and three additional rooms, part for the boiler room First floor: entrance hall that leads to the balcony on one side from the courtyard side on the right, the kitchen with open space living room and dining room, and exit to the balcony on the left, a bathroom and three bedrooms Second floor: entrance hall on the left are two bedrooms that open onto the balcony on the left, a bathroom and two more bedrooms stairs to the attic Specifics: the house is built with quality the whole thing needs to be arranged all connections are inside the attic can be an even smaller apartment of 60m2 it can be used as a business-residential building the entire building with garage and swimming pool is legalized and has a use permit For any additional information as well as a tour, feel free to contact us. Ivana +385 98 304 111
